description: MVC extension methods for rendering Gravatar avatar images from gravatar.com.
summary: NGravatar provides MVC HtmlHelper and UrlHelper extension methods for rendering Gravatar avatars from gravatar.com. The project is licensed under the MIT open-source license and is hosted at Google Code. See http://code.google.com/p/ngravatar/ for more information. Gravatars are retrieved based on an email address and optional parameters. A rendered Gravatar on an MVC view page might look something like: <%= Html.Gravatar("ngravatar@kendoll.net", 220, null, NGravatar.Rating.PG, new { style = "display:block;margin:0px auto;" }) %> The above line would render an tag with the source of the Gravatar for "ngravatar@kendoll.net". The size, default image, rating, and any additional HTML attributes can also be specified. Using NGravatar requires that the "NGravatar.Html" namespace be added to the Web.config. See the source at Google Code for an example project.
title: NGravatar
